title: Railworks Copilot - Field Engineer AI Agents
summary: A mobile and desktop copilot for field engineers combining knowledge graphs, retrieval, and planning agents to speed diagnosis and resolution.
problem: Field engineers rely on fragmented documentation (PDFs, manuals, tickets) and inconsistent expertise, causing long diagnosis times, duplicated work, and slow onboarding.
solution: Built a multi-agent AI copilot that combines a Neo4j-based knowledge graph, retrieval-augmented search, and a planner/actor agent. Integrated with CMDB, ServiceNow, IoT telemetry, and imaging to provide step-by-step guidance, automated ticket triage, and contextual recommendations.

key_components: Knowledge graph (Neo4j) consolidating docs, tickets, and asset relationships
Planner agent for task decomposition and tool selection
Mobile copilot UI with offline sync
Integrations with ticketing, CMDB, and IoT telemetry

challenges: Merging heterogeneous data sources with lineage and trust scoring
Designing low-latency retrieval for mobile users
Ensuring agents take safe, verifiable actions (audit trail)
Managing offline-first mobile behaviour and synchronization

metrics.diagnosis_time_reduction: Average diagnosis time reduced from 120 minutes to 12 minutes

impact.business_outcome: Improved field productivity, faster onboarding, reduced downtime and operational costs.
